Empty.Text_2: Vous n'avez pas encore créé de Timeline. Les Timelines sont des collections de personnes, de messages et de hashtags, qui vous aident à garder votre contenu bien rangé.

EmptyFollow.Text_2: Looks like you're not following any timelines yet! By following timelines, you can see all the latest updates from the people and topics that matter to you.

Post.Empty: Added posts will appear here. You can add a post to your Timelines by selecting 'add post to Timeline' (three dots menu on the top right of each post).

Success.Title: Timeline successfully created
Success.Subtitle: You can now add posts to this timeline.

Editor.Sub_Header: Remplissez le blanc, enregistrez et profitez de votre nouvelle Timeline.

Post.Title: Publier
Post.Desc: Les messages ajoutés manuellement apparaîtront ici. Vous pouvez ajouter manuellement une publication à une Timeline en sélectionnant 'Ajouter une publication à la Timeline' dans le menu en haut à droite de chaque publication.

Modal_Add_Post.Title: Select timeline
Modal_Add_Post.Subtitle_1: Add post to timeline below. You
Modal_Add_Post.Subtitle_2: can unselect it to remove it from Timeline

Comment.Title: Reply to join the conversation

Downvote.Title: Downvote to join the debate
Downvote.Desc: Sign in now to voice your opinion.

AddToTimeline.Title: Add to Timeline
AddToTimeline.Desc: Timelines are collections of people, posts, and hashtags, that help you keep your content tidy. Sign in now to add this post to your Timeline.

CreateTimeline.Title: Create New Timeline
CreateTimeline.Desc: Timelines are collections of people, posts, and hashtags, that help you keep your content tidy. Sign in now create a Timeline.

FollowTimeline.Title: Subscribe Timeline
FollowTimeline.Desc: Stay up to date with the latest content of this Timeline. Sign in now to subscribe.

SendTip.Title: Envoyer un pourboire
